channel.title: Any good portal mods?
channel.description:
I'm looking for a really good Portal mod to play. I found a few (listed below) but I want others please tell me Your fav Portal mod and others...
mods I have/have planned to play when realeased
1.)Portal: Prelude 2.)Portal: Memories 3.)portal: Project-Alpha 4.)Gamma Energy ===================== 1.) Blue portals 2.) Portal Stay inside =====================
thanks for your info!

item.title: Any good portal mods?
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
bigfan421:

Listed below?

It’s a bot. So far its three posts have been the first X words of the first post in a thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Any good portal mods?
item.dc:creator: jerry
item.description:
FireTime:

check out Factum Solus (Episode 1). Final part is intense plus it features the musical stylings of the hamster alliance.

+1.

I didn’t know you could make stuff like the
“waving” floor in Source?

Read full topic

item.title: Any good portal mods?
item.dc:creator: TheGodofTime
item.description:
yes I have played (and beaten) portal the flash Version.
As with the topic of Map packs I like them, but I like mods so much more…
anyway Gear Portal-map pack V3 I will try
hmm…

Read full topic

item.title: Any good portal mods?

item.description:
sploopidy:

Gamma Energy is really good.

EDIT: Maybe Black Mesa is worth playing.

well Mr. EDIT you made me lol

item.title: Any good portal mods?
item.dc:creator: henry132
item.description:
FireTime:

check out Factum Solus (Episode 1). Final part is intense plus it features the musical stylings of the hamster alliance.

Second that. Also Flash Mappack is good. Portal: Prelude was untested. Blue Portals seems very interesting.

item.title: Any good portal mods?
item.dc:creator: taxi_evil
item.description:
I can’t remember which one I played, but it was harder than diamond-tipped Jesus. So you get plenty of mileage out of them…

Read full topic

item.title: Any good portal mods?
item.dc:creator: Stuntz
item.description:
I guess I will add my current project to ModDB here soon. Mine will be called “Soft Rain”

The mod was inspired by not the original poem, but the short story version of “There will come soft rains”. Throughout the mod though you will hear verses of the poem by Sara Teasdale.

What to expect? Well, lets just say Gravity defying turret bowling with rockets. And one hell of a ending, O and a prototype B.S. Cube.

Read full topic

item.title: Any good portal mods?
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
Are you also open to map packs, or are you only interested in mods? If the former, I recommend Flash Version Map Pack, and Underground Story. If the latter, I recommend Aperture Deja Vu.

Read full topic
